SuperSonic.policy_search¶

SuperSonic uses A PolSearch_main to call start_engine() to search best policy for the optimization task.

SuperSonic Tasks Policy Search:

  • PolSearch_main

PolSearch_main¶

class SuperSonic.policy_search.supersonic_main.PolSearch_main(flags)[source]¶
Class

This is a inferface to call start_engine to search policy.

start_engine()[source]¶

Calling to policy_search() invokes SuperSonic meta-optimizer, where the developer can also limit the number of trials spent on client RL searching. using policy_define.SuperOptimizer() to define policy strategies and split dataset. using policy_search.train() to search best policy for objective task. finally, using CSR(bestpolicy).main() to deploy best policy strategy and optimize the program.
